original: intros Q p H. induction H. - exists p. apply reducestar0. unfold reduceplus. split. apply reduce_inv2. apply cs. exists p. auto. unfold irreducible. split. apply rep_plus_zero_reduce. apply cs. exists r1. split. apply reduce_inv2. apply cs. exists q. auto. - destruct IHcanonical as [t Ht]. destruct Ht as [Ht1 Ht2]. exists t. apply reducestar0. unfold reduceplus. split. apply reduce_inv2. apply cs. exists p. auto. unfold irreducible. split. apply rep_plus_zero_reduce. apply cs. exists r1. split. apply reduce_inv2. apply cs. exists q. auto.
